data.meta_description: We are providers of special technology and are able to change solutions quickly. Our team is highly qualified, trained and well-rehearsed
data.text:
OUR AREAS OF EXPERTISE

Transportation of highly sensitive technology, with a focus on medical technology, utilizing our own specialized vehicles and cranes.

Installation into buildings using cranes, heavy-duty scaffolding, crane bridges, or simply by hand with the use of heavy-duty rollers and hydraulic jacks.

Assembly ready for operation according to manufacturer.

Intelligent dismantling of medical equipment for potential reuse or recycling.
